Q= ( P NH 3 ) 2 ( P N 2 ) ( P H 2 ) 3

· Removing NH 3 from the reaction vessel reduces the value of Q . The reaction consumes more reactants to generate more NH 3 because Q<K .

Q= ( P NH 3 ) 2 ( P N 2 ) ( P H 2 ) 3
